msg: replacing some deprecated code after upgrading lucene from 2.2.0 to 2.4.1 (see PDFBOX-365)

author: chabotc
msg: The libxml2 based DOM parser sometimes mangles (invalid) html, which caused previously working gadgets (like the todo gadget we often use as an example) to break, so now the code detects if content rewriting and/or template parsing is required, and if not, defaults to the old string-concactination behavior
